roleset.name: (cause to) become acid
roleset.note: ACETIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'acetify' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4. (from acetify.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: transitive, metaphorical
example.text: John acetified his beer by leaving it outside for weeks on end.
example.arg: by leaving it outside for weeks on end
